page.title: 10ROLLS ROYCE,CREWE
page.content: {ROLLS ROYCE, CREWE.} The Rolls Royce is one of the best cars in the World.The factory that builds them is one of the main employers in Crewe. If you wanted to buy a Rolls Royce you would have to be rich or famous,-or both,as they are very expensive indeed. The reason they are so expensive is because most of the car is{handmade.}They are also built from the{finest materials. A Silver Flying {Lady}is mounted on the radiator grill of each car. In the mornings and evenings thousands of{cyclists}crowd the roads as they go to and from the Rolls Royce and nearby {B.R.E.L.}works. There are more bikes on the road in Crewe than anywhere else in the country. Rolls Royce and the railways are what Crewe is most famous for.
